name: Leo War zone
description:
Leo

(Legionary e- saver operation) war zone

Is a third person action game. This is a story based game and is played offline. Data is hacked by cyber hackers and you have to delete all the data by searching the hackers' computer. The green color in the radar will indicate the correct computer.

Game details- 

Weapons - 8+

Vehicles- 3+

Mission-=13+

Simple controls

AI enemies

                       

  

Leo war zone is a shooting game where a soilder delete the data for national security.  This game offers an incredibly fun . The game also takes up less memory space than other similar games. So you all can enjoy playing it.
